title: Fruit chicken curry with orange and tomatoes
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '3 teaspoons tandoori masala powder', '1 teaspoon garam masala powder', '9 dried curry leaves, crushed', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '8 chicken thighs or 4 chicken breast fillets, cut into bite size pieces', '4 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 (5cm) piece root ginger, chopped', '1 red chilli, chopped, or to taste', '1 punnet cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon tomato ketchup', '1 teaspoon orange zest', '1 orange, juiced', '200ml chicken stock', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons sweet and hot chilli sauce']
